languages.text: "Шерин?" {n}Неожиданно серьезный взгляд Джай упирается в вас.{/n} "Долгое время я следовала за вами всюду, словно полуночная луна, желающая нагнать утреннюю звезду. Как же так получилось, что в погоне за вашим светом я оказалась на пороге безвестной тьмы, в которой таится ужасный враг?"

"Shereen?" {n}Jae's solemn gaze is suddenly fixed on you.{/n} "Long have I followed you wherever you go, like the midnight moon striving to catch up with the morning star. How is it that in chasing after your light, I now find myself on the threshold of an unknown darkness, one in which a terrible enemy lurks?"
languages.original_text: "Шерин?" {n}Неожиданно серьезный взгляд Джай упирается в вас.{/n} "Долгое время я следовала за вами всюду, словно полуночная луна, желающая нагнать утреннюю звезду. Как же так получилось, что в погоне за вашим светом я оказалась на пороге безвестной тьмы, в которой таится ужасный враг?"

How is it that in chasing after your light, I now find myself on the threshold of an unknown darkness, one in which a terrible enemy lurks?"

How is it that in chasing after your light, I now find myself on the threshold of an unknown darkness, one in which a terrible enemy lurks?"

"Shereen?" {n}Jae's solemn gaze is suddenly fixed on you.{/n} "Long have I followed you wherever you go, like the midnight moon striving to catch up with the morning star. How is it that in chasing after your light, I now find myself on the threshold of an unknown darkness, one in which a terrible enemy lurks?"

"Shereen?" {n}Jae's solemn gaze is suddenly fixed on you.{/n} "Long have I followed you wherever you go, like the midnight moon striving to catch up with the morning star. How is it that in chasing after your light, I now find myself on the threshold of an unknown darkness, one in which a terrible enemy lurks?"

languages.text: 「シャリーン？」{n}ジェイが不意に厳しい目でこちらを見つめてきた。{/n}「あたしは夜の月が朝焼けに追いつこうとするように、どこまでもあんたを追いかけてきたわ。あんたの光を求めてついてきたのに、恐ろしい敵が潜む闇に身を投じるはめになるなんて、一体どういうことなの？」
languages.original_text: "Shereen?" {n}Jae's solemn gaze is suddenly fixed on you.{/n} "Long have I followed you wherever you go, like the midnight moon striving to catch up with the morning star. How is it that in chasing after your light, I now find myself on the threshold of an unknown darkness, one in which a terrible enemy lurks?"

traits.locale_text: 「シャリーン？」{n}ジェイが不意に厳しい目でこちらを見つめてきた。{/n}「あたしは夜の月が朝焼けに追いつこうとするように、どこまでもあんたを追いかけてきたわ。あんたの光を求めてついてきたのに、恐ろしい敵が潜む闇に身を投じるはめになるなんて、一体どういうことなの？」

languages.text: “亲爱的？”{n}婕伊突然朝你投来了严肃的目光。{/n}“这么久以来，无论你走到哪里，我都始终追随在你身后，就像深夜的月亮追逐启明的晨星。可如今，我追随着你的光芒，怎么竟不知不觉地踏入了未知的黑暗，要去面对可怕的敌人？”
languages.original_text: "Shereen?" {n}Jae's solemn gaze is suddenly fixed on you.{/n} "Long have I followed you wherever you go, like the midnight moon striving to catch up with the morning star. How is it that in chasing after your light, I now find myself on the threshold of an unknown darkness, one in which a terrible enemy lurks?"

traits.locale_text: “亲爱的？”{n}婕伊突然朝你投来了严肃的目光。{/n}“这么久以来，无论你走到哪里，我都始终追随在你身后，就像深夜的月亮追逐启明的晨星。可如今，我追随着你的光芒，怎么竟不知不觉地踏入了未知的黑暗，要去面对可怕的敌人？”

languages.text: "Shereen?" {n}Jaes ernster Blick ist plötzlich ganz auf dich gerichtet.{/n} "Ich folge euch seit langem, wohin Ihr auch geht, wie der Mitternachtsmond, der versucht, den Morgenstern einzuholen. Wie kann es sein, dass ich auf der Jagd nach Eurem Licht nun selbst an der Schwelle einer unbekannten Dunkelheit stehe, in der ein schrecklicher Feind lauert?"
languages.original_text: "Shereen?" {n}Jae's solemn gaze is suddenly fixed on you.{/n} "Long have I followed you wherever you go, like the midnight moon striving to catch up with the morning star. How is it that in chasing after your light, I now find myself on the threshold of an unknown darkness, one in which a terrible enemy lurks?"

traits.locale_text: "Shereen?" {n}Jaes ernster Blick ist plötzlich ganz auf dich gerichtet.{/n} "Ich folge euch seit langem, wohin Ihr auch geht, wie der Mitternachtsmond, der versucht, den Morgenstern einzuholen. Wie kann es sein, dass ich auf der Jagd nach Eurem Licht nun selbst an der Schwelle einer unbekannten Dunkelheit stehe, in der ein schrecklicher Feind lauert?"

languages.text: «¿Shereen?». {n}La mirada solemne de Jae se clava en la tuya.{/n} «Llevo mucho tiempo siguiéndole, como la luna intentando alcanzar el sol. ¿Cómo es que buscando constantemente su luz he acabado en el umbral de una oscuridad desconocida donde acecha un enemigo espantoso?».
languages.original_text: "Shereen?" {n}Jae's solemn gaze is suddenly fixed on you.{/n} "Long have I followed you wherever you go, like the midnight moon striving to catch up with the morning star. How is it that in chasing after your light, I now find myself on the threshold of an unknown darkness, one in which a terrible enemy lurks?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Shereen?». {n}La mirada solemne de Jae se clava en la tuya.{/n} «Llevo mucho tiempo siguiéndole, como la luna intentando alcanzar el sol. ¿Cómo es que buscando constantemente su luz he acabado en el umbral de una oscuridad desconocida donde acecha un enemigo espantoso?».

languages.text: {n}Jae vous fixe soudainement d'un regard grave.{/n} « Shereen ? Je marche dans vos pas depuis longtemps, à l'instar de la lune de minuit cherchant à rattraper l'étoile de l'aube. Comment se fait-il qu'en suivant votre lumière, je me trouve aujourd'hui sur le seuil de ténèbres inconnues abritant un ennemi effroyable ? »
languages.original_text: "Shereen?" {n}Jae's solemn gaze is suddenly fixed on you.{/n} "Long have I followed you wherever you go, like the midnight moon striving to catch up with the morning star. How is it that in chasing after your light, I now find myself on the threshold of an unknown darkness, one in which a terrible enemy lurks?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae vous fixe soudainement d'un regard grave.{/n} « Shereen ? Je marche dans vos pas depuis longtemps, à l'instar de la lune de minuit cherchant à rattraper l'étoile de l'aube. Comment se fait-il qu'en suivant votre lumière, je me trouve aujourd'hui sur le seuil de ténèbres inconnues abritant un ennemi effroyable ? »

languages.text: "Şirinim?" {n}Jae, vakur bakışlarını sana dikiyor.{/n} "Gece yarısı ayının seher yıldızını yakalamaya çalışması gibi nice zamandır nereye gidersen seni takip ettim. Senin ışığını takip ederken nasıl oluyor da kendimi bilinmezliğin karanlığının eşiğinde, orada kol gezen dehşet verici düşmanların karşısında buluyorum?"
languages.original_text: "Shereen?" {n}Jae's solemn gaze is suddenly fixed on you.{/n} "Long have I followed you wherever you go, like the midnight moon striving to catch up with the morning star. How is it that in chasing after your light, I now find myself on the threshold of an unknown darkness, one in which a terrible enemy lurks?"
